snippet: Roger Federer is sitting out the rest of this season, including the Rio de Janeiro Olympics and U.S. Open, to protect his surgically repaired left knee....
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer is sitting out the rest of this season, including the Rio de Janeiro Olympics and U.S. Open, to protect his surgically repaired left knee.

headline.print_headline: Federer to Miss Rest of Season, Including Olympics, US Open
headline.main: Federer to Miss Rest of Season, Including Olympics, US Open
